scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc --project tsconfig.json && npm run bundle:esm && npm run bundle:esm:min && npm run bundle:umd && npm run bundle:umd:min && npm run build:stats
scripts.build:stats: (cd dist && ls -lh index*js index*gz | tail -n +2 | awk '{print $5,$9}')
scripts.bundle:esm: rollup dist/index.js --file dist/index.mjs --format esm  --external sketch-thru-plan-sdk --globals sketch-thru-plan-sdk:StpSDK
scripts.bundle:esm:min: terser --ecma 6 --compress --mangle --module -o dist/index.min.mjs -- dist/index.mjs && gzip -9 -c dist/index.min.mjs > dist/index.min.mjs.gz
scripts.bundle:umd: rollup dist/index.js --file dist/index.umd.js --format umd --name tsQuickstart --external sketch-thru-plan-sdk --globals sketch-thru-plan-sdk:StpSDK
scripts.bundle:umd:min: terser --ecma 6 --compress --mangle -o dist/index.umd.min.js -- dist/index.umd.js && gzip -9 -c dist/index.umd.min.js > dist/index.umd.min.js.gz
